attributes.action: ensure that any organisation that provides training at a cost to to any individual, should be compelled to publish information about how many of their students 'Begin', 'Pass', 'Fail' or 'Do Not Complete' courses for each year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is designed to ensure that people who pay for training are fully informed about the ability of any given training organisation to help their students to achieve a qualification.
